question: What is the theme of the 2017 World Water Day (WWD)?
explanation: The World Water Day (WWD) is held annually on March 22 to focus attention on the importance of freshwater and to advocate the sustainable management of freshwater resources. The 2017 theme “Wastewater” focuses on reducing and reusing waste water. This year’s campaign is ‘Why waste water?’ provides an important opportunity to consolidate and build upon the previous World Water Days to highlight the symbiosis between water and wastewater in the quest for sustainable development.
